Next generation digital banking

Take your financial life online.Your Easybank account will be a one-stop-shop for spending, saving, budgeting, investing, and much more.

Why choose Easybank?

We leverage Open Banking to turn your back accout into your financial hub. Control your finances like never before.

Online Banking

Our modern web and mobile applications allow you to keep track of your finances wherever you are in the world.

Simple Budgeting

See exactly where your money goes each month. Receive notifications when you're close to your hiting limits.

Fast Onboarding

We don't do branches. Open your account in minutes online and start taking control of your finances right away.

Open API

Manage your savings, investments, pension, and much more from one account. Tracking your money has never been easier.
